name: Frog Island!
description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of Frog Island!

Frog Island is a procedurally generated island, created with multiple techniques, inhabited by some amazingly amphibious amigos! Watch as they wander the islands, stop to eat succulent meals, and visit tourist hotspots!

All manners of buildings can spawn (no pun intended!) on Frog Island! From supermarkets to camping sites, water fountains to mysterious ruins.

Controls:

WASD - Move Camera

Q/E - Zoom in/out

Space - Select frog in reticule

Number Keys - Display info maps (more info below)

R - Regenerate island (you can also use the restart button in the lower left)

Info maps:

1 - Building Map:

Each different colour is a different type of building

2 - Town Map:

Each Different colour is a different town on Frog island. Select a frog to find out which town they're from!

3 - Island Shore:

This map shows the outline / coast line of each island

4 - Perlin Noise:

This map is the generated Perlin noise map used to spawn trees!

5 - Voronoi Camo:

This is an example of the Voronoi pattern that is procedurally generated for each tent to mimic camouflage.

6 - Raw Voronoi Map:

This is an example of an unaltered Voronoi pattern where each 'district' has it's own colour. In the camo example, some neighbouring districts share the same colours, creating more complex shapes that appear like camouflage.

Videos: Gameplay Overview Generation Overview
